subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Each team shot 39 percent from the field, but the Orange’s 2-3 zone defense lulled California into taking long jump shots and enveloped the Bears’ swingman Allen Crabbe.
snippet: Each team shot 39 percent from the field, but the Orange’s 2-3 zone defense lulled California into taking long jump shots and enveloped the Bears’ swingman Allen Crabbe.
